## ArticleJsonLdProps.datePublished property

The date and time the article was first published, in ISO 8601 format.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
datePublished: string;
```

## Remarks

Best practices:

- The date shouldn't change over time. - We recommend including the hour information in addition to the day in the timestamp. - The value for dateModified should be more recent than the value for datePublished.
